name: Breakout (itch) (TheCyberTronn)
description:
Breakout is a free-to-play (but if you'd like to throw me a bit of money, please do) clone of the popular game by Atari, instead made in the Game Maker engine. This was a hobby project by myself, TheCyberTronn with music by PyroAkane.

Features:

  • Addictive gameplay!
  • 7 unique levels in the campaign!
  • Endless Mode!
  • 6 unique power-ups!
  • Particles everywhere!
  • Two control schemes, mouse and keyboard!
  • That satisfying feeling you get when you get the ball above the bricks and then it breaks loads of bricks and you feel godlike because you just pulled of a wicked-sick move!
  • ...and loads more!
